about.title: Transforming ideas into exceptional digital solutions
about.description: Unifying creativity with code to bring ideas to digital realities. Im passionate about creating immersive web experiences that captivate and inspire. Explore my portfolio and witness the perfect blend of innovation and technical expertise in each project.

firstJob.title: Junior Frontend Developer
firstJob.firstDescription: Built Landing Pages from Scratch: Developed landing pages from mockups, ensuring a seamless transition from design to implementation.
firstJob.secondDescription: Custom Plugins for API Queries: Created personalized plugins for querying data through a REST API, enhancing data retrieval and integration capabilities.

secondJob.title: Junior Frontend Developer
secondJob.firstDescription: Enhance custom components for different platforms built for students, parents, super admin, content manager, advisors, affiliates and teachers. Improve readability and functionality, through refactoring the legacy project architecture.
secondJob.secondDescription: Build a chat system for our students and teachers.
secondJob.thirdDescription: Migrate from PHP to NextJS 14 and Node.js, helping to increase efficiency for our team and students as well.

thirdJob.title: React Native Teacher
thirdJob.firstDescription: Develop an introductory course to the development of mobile applications with React Native.
thirdJob.secondDescription: Create and design didactic material for students.
thirdJob.thirdDescription: Create, design and execute a project for the course as a final test of knowledge. An instagram style blog application was made where basic to advanced knowledge such as useState, useEffect, useContext, use of props, creation of hooks, etc... were put into practice.

firstEducation.title: Universidad del Valle
firstEducation.description: Professional career in Business Administration. With experience in GTH (Human Talent Management), accounting, project management and other related activities. Supporting me with different tools such as Office, Power BI and Databases (relational and non-relational).

secondEducation.title: SENA
secondEducation.description: Technical career in Software Analysis and Development. With experience in web and desktop application development, starting from its planning, design and development. Supported with different tools such as Miro, Lucichard, Office, Databases (relational and non-relational) and various programming languages.
